alert.note: Alert for Highlands; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 8:54PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Highlands and southeastern Polk Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 853 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles northeast of Avon Park to near Sebring to 6 miles west of Lake Placid. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Avon Park, Lake Placid, Sebring Regional Airport, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Frostproof, Indian Lake Estates, River Ranch, Sebring Shores, Lake Josephine, Placid Lakes, Lorida, Avon Park Executive Airport, and Avon Park Air Force Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
